title: Three Coins for Big Gains: Uwerx (WERX), GALA (GALA), and Stellar (XLM)
description:
Three coins stand out with their unique offerings and promising prospects for investors, GALA (GALA), Stellar (XLM), and Uwerx. 

From Uwerx's disruptive approach to revolutionizing freelancing to GALA's (GALA) vibrant gaming ecosystem and Stellar's (XLM) mission to transform global financial systems, each coin brings something distinct to the table. 

 

Keep reading to uncover the factors that make them worthy contenders for significant gains in every savvy investor’s portfolio.

Riding the Waves of GALA (GALA)

GALA (GALA) token is like the lifeblood of the Gala Games ecosystem. It’s a digital utility token that fuels everything within the Gala Games world. 

What's cool is that GALA (GALA) is secured using advanced cryptography and is unique to the Gala Games ecosystem. With GALA (GALA), users have full control. 

As for the price, GALA (GALA) is currently valued at $0.03041 and has been showing some promising trading volume of $52,405,654 over the past 24 hours. Our GALA (GALA) forecast predicts a potential 100% increase, reaching around $0.0640 by Q4 2024.

Stellar (XLM): Uniting the World with Seamless Transactions

Stellar (XLM) is a decentralized network that aims to bridge the gap between global financial systems. It was launched in 2015 by The Stellar Development Foundation. Since then, this peer-to-peer platform has made transactions simple and affordable.

Designed with the goal of enabling swift and reliable movement of financial resources, Stellar (XLM) acts as a protocol for payment providers and financial institutions. 

Stellar (XLM) serves as a crucial link, connecting individuals, banks, and payment processors, while offering the ability to create, send, and trade various types of cryptocurrencies.

Currently priced at $0.08818, with a market cap of $2,363,744,799, Stellar (XLM) holds promising potential. Crypto analysts foresee it reaching $0.0932 by Q3 2024. 

However, amidst the excitement surrounding GALA (GALA) and Stellar (XLM), it's essential not to overlook the incredible prospects of Uwerx, making it a standout choice for the coming year.

Uwerx (WERX) Presale Shatters Records with Stage 1 in 17 Days and Stage 2 in Just 8 Days

The Uwerx community has spoken! With an overwhelming 98.2% support from a Twitter poll, the Test Airdrop is set to take place on July 31st, marking a significant milestone for the platform.

Listening to the community's voice, Uwerx is implementing an imminent token lock supported by 82.8% of voters. This 25-year lock ensures long-term stability, assuring investors of the platform's commitment to their security.

Uwerx's presale progress has been astounding, with Stage 1 completed in a mere 17 days and Stage 2 taking just 8 days. The community's enthusiasm and rapid response showcase the platform's undeniable appeal.

Uwerx's presale is in full swing, currently at Stage 5, offering tokens at an attractive price of $0.041 each with a generous 15% bonus on every purchase. Don't miss out on this opportunity to join the Uwerx revolution.

Uwerx (WERX) on the Rise: CoinSniper Listing and Uniswap Arrival Accelerate Growth

Transparency and fairness are at the core of Uwerx's philosophy. The team will renounce the contracts when the project is ready to launch on centralized exchanges, and taxes are zero.

Say goodbye to exorbitant transaction fees! Uwerx has set its platform transaction fee at a minimal 1%, contrasting sharply with industry giants like Upwork and Fiverr. Uwerx is committed to empowering freelancers and clients alike.

The Uwerx Vault is a groundbreaking feature that allows users to securely store their WERX tokens for various periods, akin to staking while earning rewards based on platform variables. 

Trust and credibility are paramount for Uwerx. The platform has undergone thorough audits by renowned firms such as SolidProof and InterFi Network, ensuring the integrity and reliability of its infrastructure.

Uwerx's journey continues to gain momentum with its listing on CoinSniper and an upcoming listing on Uniswap by August 1st. These listings bolster Uwerx's visibility and open doors for increased engagement with the platform. The Uwerx community is growing and has amassed over 5,500 sign-ups, 1,600 Twitter followers, and 1,600 Telegram members.

The clock is ticking! The hard-cap presale end date is set for July 31st, 2023. Don't miss your chance to be part of this transformative journey.

Uwerx (WERX) Unveils Alpha Platform: PDF Release and Anticipation for the Web-Based Launch

Uwerx values its community and has responded to feedback. The team has made modifications to token allocations, ensuring fairness and addressing the demands arising from the dynamic presale environment.

The Alpha Platform is beginning to take shape. On May 19, the PDF version was made available, but that was just the beginning. Prepare yourself for the web-based launch that will include elements like the landing page, sign-in/sign-up page, user dashboard, and more.

Stay tuned for continuous updates! Uwerx will release more parts of the Alpha platform in the coming weeks, allowing users to explore features such as settings, posting jobs, finding jobs, and more.

The transition from the Alpha Version to the Beta Version is on the horizon. Soon, users will have the chance to actively test the platform themselves, contributing to its refinement and improvement.

Uwerx values your input! Share your thoughts, recommendations, and ideas on the platform's design through the dedicated feedback email at feedback@uwerx.network. Together, let's shape the future of the freelance industry.

Join the presale and take advantage of the 15% bonus!

Presale: invest.uwerx.network

Telegram: https://t.me/uwerx_network 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/uwerx_network

Website: https://www.uwerx.network/

 

Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Introducing Ethscriptions: Ethereum’s Take on Inscribed Digital Artifacts
description: Amidst the buzz and persistent interest surrounding Bitcoin-derived Ordinal inscriptions, the co-founder of the Capsule 21 podcast introduced Ethscriptions, an analogous innovation that harnesses the power of the Ethereum blockchain. Ethscriptions, as described on the online platform ethscriptions.com, is a “new way of creating and sharing digital artifacts on Ethereum using transaction calldata.” From Bitcoin […]

title: Coinbase (COIN) continues strong performance amid regulatory pressure
description: Coinbase, the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the United States, saw its stock price climb nearly 6% over the past week, defying the overhang of the ongoing lawsuit by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Despite regulatory uncertainties, Coinbase’s stock closed the week’s session at $55.59, marking a 5.93% increase. Since the SEC’s announcement of ... Read more

title: Coinbase seeks clarity amid an ongoing legal battle with SEC
description: In a bid to address the United States Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) ambiguous responses and prolonged silence, cryptocurrency company Coinbase has filed an official request in federal court. Coinbase took this action ahead of its upcoming deadline, citing the SEC’s evasion of a direct question posed by a federal court as an unusual move. ... Read more
